name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce to Salesforce Sync & Record Detail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce to Salesforce Sync Status & Record Details Plugin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce to Salesforce Sync Status & Record Details plugin works in both Classic and Lightning:
	i) Shows Salesforce to Salesforce record Sync Status and corresponding Partner Id of the shared record in the target Org

	ii) Shows all Field values for the given record and it's complete Field History
	
	iii) UUID/GUID Converter

It's also available for Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/s2s-lightning/
